front.title: IPv4 Residual Deployment via IPv6 - a Stateless Solution (4rd)

abstract.t: The 4rd automatic tunneling mechanism makes IPv4 Residual Deployment possible via IPv6 networks without maintaining for this per-customer states in 4rd-capable nodes (reverse of the IPv6 Rapid Deployment of 6rd). To cope with the IPv4 address shortage, customer sites can be assigned shared public IPv4 addresses with restricted port sets.
